snippet: The Red Bulls signed the English midfielder Lloyd Sam, 27, who played last season with Notts County of the English League One after being lent there by Leeds.
abstract: New York Red Bulls sign English midfielder Lloyd Sam.
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls signed the English midfielder Lloyd Sam, 27, who played last season with Notts County of the English League One after being lent there by Leeds.

headline.seo: Red Bulls Sign English Midfielder Lloyd Sam
